version_description:
Guess what? Your #1 dictionary app has an update! Here’s what’s new:
*Better word search experiences—no bugs here!
*More language lover articles about the English language!
*Loving the offline dictionary? It’s now faster than ever.

Guess what? Your #1 dictionary app has an update! Here’s what’s new:
*Better word search experiences—no bugs here!
*More language lover articles about the English language!
*Loving the offline dictionary? It’s now faster than ever.

全新外观设计：我们最新的设计可以让用户更方便地搜索恰当的单词，然后进一步了解单

词的定义、发音和语境。 

浏览新的收录内容：按类别（例如博客、幻灯片和每日单词）轻松浏览更新后的收录内容

。

个性化：更方便地管理您最近的搜索历史，并且可以自定义扩展详情和附加词典的顺序。

Thanks for all the feedback, and don’t fret, we haven’t removed Thesaurus. 
TIP: Thesaurus is now called Synonyms – find it at the bottom of your search results.

Also, in this update:
• Fixed: critical bugs
• Added support for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus screens

- Added compatibility for iOS 9 and watchOS 2
- New support for video content
- Bug fixes

恰逢假期，我们增加了新功能，带来更好的 Dictionary.com 体验。感谢您宝贵的反馈，我们在最新版本中更新了以下功能：

* 定义与知识库——是的！我们会将知识库带回。在 APP 的任意位置检索词典与知识库，并从检索框内选择条目。
* 检索历史——点击检索框，查看您最新的检索结果。
* 收藏单词——通过点击首页右上角的星形图标随时访问您的收藏夹。
* 设置与功能——通过左上角菜单可以方便地访问您所有的 APP 选项。
* 方便使用——使用任何页面右上角的 X，体验无缝导航至首页。

我们希望你能喜欢本次更新。Dictionary.com 全体员工祝您节日快乐！

恰逢假期，我们增加了新功能，带来更好的 Dictionary.com 体验。感谢您宝贵的反馈，我们在最新版本中更新了以下功能：

* 定义与知识库——是的！我们会将知识库带回。在 APP 的任意位置检索词典与知识库，并从检索框内选择条目。
* 检索历史——点击检索框，查看您最新的检索结果。
* 收藏单词——通过点击首页右上角的星形图标随时访问您的收藏夹。

我们希望你能喜欢本次更新。Dictionary.com 全体员工祝您节日快乐！
Flex your screen! Now 3D Touch enhanced, launch directly into the search bar. Explore words using “Surprise me” or quickly find the Word of the Day. Also includes bug fixes to prevent crashes.

- Fixed crash that affected users on older versions of iOS
- Solved Word of the Day updating issue

Updated for Back to School season!
- New look and feel makes it easier to search and explore
- Bug fixes and additional improvements
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

- Bug fixes
- Content display update 
- Removal of unsupported services
bug fixes
bug fixes

Bug fixes
TOS and Privacy Policy update
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
UI optimized for iPhone X
- Minor Improvements

• Legal copyright updated to 2018.
• Other minor improvements.
- Minor improvements

- Word of the Day Improvements
- Fixed issue where searching for words with apostrophes resulted in no results
- Fixed issue preventing videos from playing.
- Minor Improvements
- Fixed an issue with the video player

- Fixed problem where clicking on any word makes it a favorite.
- Made improvements to the Help Center to make contacting Customer Service easier.
- Improvements made to the app’s video player.
- Trends feature has been removed.
- Fixed issue where push notifications still sent when setting was off.
- Word of the Day push notifications improvements

We define "app bugs" as pesky little problems that were plaguing the Dictionary.com app. 

This update will stabilize your app and make images look even better. Bye-bye, bugs!

Updates. Noun. Something you should keep turned on so you never miss an improvement from Dictionary.com! 

Has your Word of the Day quiz widget been wonky? We made some adjustments, alterations, and enhancements to bring it back in line. 

Enjoy!

Embarrassed. Adjective. Us when we realized the offline dictionary went AWOL. We're very sorry, and don't worry: We brought it back. 

(Hear ye, hear ye: If you want to hear your audio pronunciations, don't forget to crank up your phone volume!)
Legible is an adjective that means “easily readable.” You can use it to describe the new and improved Word of the Day!
- Minor improvements to data display on dictionary and thesaurus pages.
- Minor improvements to the word of the day pages.
- Minor improvements to data display on dictionary and thesaurus pages.
- Minor improvements to data display on dictionary and thesaurus pages.
- Minor improvements to data display on dictionary and thesaurus pages.
- Minor improvements to the word of the day pages.

Word of the Day. Noun. A feature we just made a whole lot better! 

While we were at it, we fixed that pesky problem with your frozen favorites list!

Did you buy example sentences? Good news. We've fixed those too!

Embarrassed. Adjective. Us when we realized the offline dictionary went AWOL. We're very sorry, and don't worry: We brought it back. 

(Hear ye, hear ye: If you want to hear your audio pronunciations, don't forget to crank up your phone volume!)
Legible is a noun that means “easily readable.” You can use it to describe the new and improved Word of the Day!
Legible is an adjective that means “easily readable.” You can use it to describe the new and improved Word of the Day!

We define "app bugs" as pesky little problems that were plaguing the Dictionary.com app. 

This update will stabilize your app and make images look even better. Bye-bye, bugs!

Updates. Noun. Something you should keep turned on so you never miss an improvement from Dictionary.com! 

Did you notice the Origin tab is missing? You're right. We still have origins available alongside definitions, but we have removed the tab for now. 

Origin is a noun that can mean the first stage of existence, and we promise we're working on a second stage of the tab that will be even better.

Speaking of better, we made some fixes that fit the definition to a T.

Updates. Noun. Something you should keep turned on so you never miss an improvement from Dictionary.com! 

Has your Word of the Day quiz widget been wonky? We made some adjustments, alterations, and enhancements to bring it back in line. 

Enjoy!

Voice. noun. Something you can now use when searching for the definition of a word.

Our push notifications just got a whole lot better too. Travel anywhere in the world and receive real-time notifications and alerts from Dictionary.com.

You may also notice our Word of the Day has had a makeover. Check out the polished new look!
- Minor Improvements
-Minor improvements

[ hwoh, woh ]
interjection
what you’ll be saying once you update to the all new (neoteric, modern, newfangled) Dictionary.com app experience!

Want new and more definitions? We’ve got those. 
Want fun wordplay? Yup, we’ve added that too. 

Want a fresh look that makes finding just the right words even easier? You’ll have to hit that update button!

Want new and more definitions? We’ve got those. 
Want fun wordplay? Yup, we’ve added that too. 

Want a fresh look that makes finding just the right words even easier? You’ll have to hit that update button!

Synonym pop quiz! What's new, fresh, and current?
The Dictionary.com app! Experience the new Word of the Day, and quiz your way to wordplay fun! Hit update to see it all!

Did you know the phrase “what’s cooking” dates all the way back to the 1940s?

Here’s what’s cooking at Dictionary.com: We’ve made some fixes to font sizes to make your app easier to read, and made some improvement to your Word of the Day quiz widget. 

Did you spot a strange issue with double word synonyms? We fixed that too!

Want more word fun? Come follow us on Instagram: @dictionarycom and @thesaurus_com!

Crash, boom, and bang are all examples of onomatopoeia. 

Good news! We’ve made some fixes so your app won’t crash. Now you can go look up the meaning of onomatopoeia, and tweet us what you find: @dictionarycom!
Did you know the word open can be used as a verb, a noun, or even an adjective? Hit update. Then open your app to see a new open screen!
Calling all word lovers! We want to hear from you! Hit update NOW to play the new Dictionary.com word quiz. Then share your score with us on Twitter or Instagram: @dictionarycom!
Did you know the word “fix” has been around since the 1400s? We put in a fix for some issues in the app so you can look up even more word origins!

Did you know the word “whoopee” is an Americanism? That means the word was born in the USA! It’s a good word to use about our new app upgrade. Here are just a couple reasons why:

How are your spelling skills? Test them out with our brand-new spelling quiz feature.

Can you pass our vocab trivia? We’re now adding fresh multiple choice quizzes each week.

Hear how more words are pronounced with our new audio fixes.

Navigate more easily from definitions to synonyms and back again!

Update your #1 English language Dictionary app today!
What's changed?
*Stop relying on spell check! Enhance your spelling skills with our brand-new spelling quizzes.
*Do you have better vocab than an elementary student? Find out! We're now adding fresh multiple-choice quizzes each week.
*Bonus: Hear how more words are pronounced with our new audio fixes in this release too.
*Plus, you can now navigate more quickly and easily from definitions to synonyms.

Guess what? Your #1 dictionary app has an update! Here’s what’s new:
*Better word search experiences—no bugs here!
*More language lover articles about the English language!
*Loving the offline dictionary? It’s now faster than ever.

Synonym of the Day. Another way to say “the best word at your fingertips.” So update now. Don’t delay!
*Looking to spice up your everyday language with precision and flair? We’ve got you covered with Synonym of the Day, our newest feature and one that is sure to enhance, augment, and strengthen your vocabulary skills.
*Learn the subtle differences between prosaic words and their scintillating synonyms so you can add some sparkle to your daily discourse.

We have an update! Here is what’s new, word buffs: 
We took a look under the hood and removed any bugs that were bugging you, so now everything just works.  
We are always improving our entries to bring you up-to-date definitions on a wide range of topics.
So any word you want, chances are we have it, along with its definition, history, and usage.

Update. Another way to say the Dictionary is better than ever. See what’s new:
We fixed all the pesky bugs without even calling an exterminator. Excelsior! 
Have you tried searching for words using our voice search option? What better way to explore than using your incredible voice.
And you can always expand your vocabulary with Word of the Day right on the app, and learn the correct pronunciation by hearing it read back to you. Whoa!

We’ve heard you love our quizzes, so we’re taking wordplay to the next level. Update your app now to get the all new Word Puzzle! 

Can you score a perfect 10? We want to see! Share your screenshots on Twitter with @dictionarycom, and maybe you’ll also score a retweet!

Guess what’s back? Apple Watch is back in the Dictionary app! We heard your feedback, and we’ve made Apple Watch functionality better than ever. Update now to get your favorite words back on your wrist!

Sparkling new updates!
Bugs? What bugs? We zapped all those suckers for you.
Need grammar help? We’ve got you! Find useful tips, word usage, and more to improve your writing. 
You can also discover fun word facts right in the app. Did you know axilla is another word for armpit? Now you do. What else can you learn?

Alert, word lover, we have updates!
Those pesky bugs? They won’t be bugging you anymore, because we fixed them.
Now you can get back to customizing your recently searched word list, and add all your favorite words to your list of new words you’ve just learned. Neat!  
And if you need help with spelling, don’t fret. We are here to aid you in your next writing project. Try a spelling quiz!

Your favorite dictionary app is about to get even better! 
We’ve added the ability to toggle between the dictionary and thesaurus, so you can search for those synonyms swiftly, speedily, and expeditiously.
Love Dictionary.com’s Word of the Day? Check out our new Word of the Day widget!
Update now to start searching

We have widgets on widgets with this new update! 
Love Dictionary.com’s Synonym of the Day? See if you can guess the correct synonym with our new Synonym of the Day widget!
Curious what words are currently topping our charts? Our Trending Words widget will be your new best friend.
Update now to access ALL THE WIDGETS … seriously, there are a lot!

Hello, we meet again. This time, with an even better update!
Glitches have you in stitches? Don’t worry, we’ve switched off all the glitches to leave you only with wordy riches.
So the next time you need a good rhyme, you can look one up in our app in no time.
In fact, finding the right definitions or synonyms from our over 2 million entries has never been so simple.

Calling all word lovers, we have updates! 
Empty the dustbin, because we’ve swept out all the bugs! 
Let our spelling quizzes help you take home the trophy for your own spelling bee (the only bug we like to see around here). 
Bonus: Take a scroll stroll through the Words of the Day whenever you want a little language refresher.

Extra, extra! The #1 dictionary app has an update for you!
We’ve scratched every itch and crushed every bug to make the app a breeze to use.
So if you’re wondering which came first, mama or mother, wonder no more! With our insightful word origins, you can learn the oldest and boldest words for the first person in your life. Mom will love that!
Plus, we offer new quizzes (like high school vocabulary) regularly that will test if you make the grade. 
The best part is you can do it all with millions of words at your fingertips.

Attention, word fans! We have an update! 
We ironed out all the bugs, no starch necessary. 
Our app will take your vocabulary to the next level with a challenging quiz every week. Who knew the dictionary could be so fun? 
And those grammar woes? Consider them gone with the help of our grammar tips.

Update. Synonym for new and improved, which is what our app is.
Put away the bug spray! We chased out those irksome bugs to make the app cleaner than ever.
Now you can find the perfect synonym you love, adore, and cherish even faster.
Not sure how to pronounce a word? Never be in doubt again with our excellent audio pronunciations.

We know what’s been bugging you, so we chased out all those bugs.
Now you can spend your time perfecting your score on our Word Puzzle game!

May we have a word with you? It’s time to update!
We’ve swept out the bugs and dusted off the shelves so you can peruse the dictionary with ease at your leisure.
Want to test out those sweet word skills? Take us up on a challenge with our vocabulary quizzes, and see how much you’ve learned!

People’s Choice Word of the Year 
The people chose…update your app to see their Word Of The Year!

Your favorite dictionary, revamped and raring to go! Update to our newest version now!
Vexed by bugs? Not anymore! Bid them adieu with our newest update, making the dictionary smoother than ever.
Plus, you can always take your vocabulary up a notch with Word of the Day and Synonym of the Day.

Time to cozy up with your favorite dictionary app, because we’ve got an update!
You’ll warm up in no time to our revitalized app, now free of those pesky bugs.
Now you can sit back, relax, and scroll through our extensive Word of the Day list, or see how well you can identify the Synonym of the Day.
We won’t keep you in the dark about our update! You asked for it, and now dark mode is here!

The # 1 Dictionary app is ready for a glow-up with our latest update. 
Did you know we released dark mode recently? This blazing new feature makes searching for your next favorite word a feast for the eyes.

We have a gift just for you: a dazzling update!
Take a look and see, no bugs in sight!
Instead, you can revel in the ability to create the perfect favorite words list, and even scroll through your recent searches to find words to add.

Psst! Update your app now for a better experience!
Have you started saving your favorite words yet? No time like the present to grow that lustrous list of linguistic love
Game on! Your favorite word puzzle has gotten even more puzzling. Update to earn coins for every word you can guess, and trade them in to grab new letters.

Ready for a change? How about an update for your favorite Dictionary app!
What’s all the buzz about? It’s for our Word Puzzle, of course! See if you’re up to the challenge.

Looking for a suitable synonym? Update for the latest functionality, then pop over for a quick Thesaurus search, using our effortless toggle.
Bonus: You’ve got the paragon of word games at your fingertips with Word Puzzle. How many words can you puzzle out?
Update your app now for a few new bells and whistles, and test your skills with our vocabulary quizzes!

For the love of language, update your app!

If you’ve ever wondered about a word’s origin story, when to use affect vs. effect, or which words match your Zodiac sign, this update is for you.

Update now for access to all of our newly added editorial content!

It’s time to update, refresh, and refurbish! 

With improved features like Synonym of the Day, we’ll never run out of ways to say it: update your app now!

See 600 brand-new words when you update your Dictionary app!

These new words reflect how our language is still catching up to the tremendous change we experienced last year, from the pandemic to protests to politics. Update your app, and learn about all the latest and greatest new words!

We heard you were feeling the need for speed! This update is for you.
 
Update now for a higher velocity version of your #1 Dictionary app! The latest version includes performance improvements that speed up load times for all your favorite definitions and synonyms.

Want premium Dictionary content for FREE? Update your app!

Once you update, you’ll see the option to temporarily UNLOCK premium features for free (you know, things like the ever-popular example sentences, encyclopedia, grammar tips, and a whole lot more). Enjoy!

Update now to access brand new editor-curated content, games, and quizzes!
Enjoy top-quality content and dive deeper than definitions to explore word origins, featured content, quizzes, and fun facts – all from our newly designed, easy-to-use homepage!

Your app version is SO last month.

Update now to stay on-trend with the latest words and phrases with improved app features like Word Trends.

Here’s a grammar pro-tip: update your app!

Download our latest version to view trending words, a fix to the offline dictionary, grammar tips, and tools for top-notch writing.

This update is jam-packed with new features that are sure to have you at a loss for words!

- We’ve introduced Shortcuts to the app, so you can quickly click a button to access all the best features, including our new and improved Word Puzzle game!
- Think you know ALL the definitions? Prove it with our new “Dictionary Shuffle” feature, which chooses a word at random and brings you to the definition.
- What’s more exciting than ... wait for it … browsing the Dictionary?! We’ve now made it even easier, with the addition of the A–Z Dictionary.

This update is jam-packed with new features!

- We’ve introduced Shortcuts to the app, so you can quickly click a button to access all the best features, including our new and improved Word Puzzle game!


- Think you know ALL the definitions? Prove it with our new “Dictionary Shuffle” feature, which chooses a word at random and brings you to the definition.


- What’s more exciting than ... wait for it … browsing the Dictionary?! We’ve now made it even easier, with the addition of the A–Z Dictionary.

Here's a grammar pro-tip: Update your app!

Download our latest version for an enhanced Word Of The Day and Synonym Of The Day experience, grammar tips, and tools for top-notch writing.

Our newest update is ready for you! 

As your #1 Dictionary app, we are on a constant quest for improvement. With features like new word releases, quizzes and editorial content, you can be too. 

Download the newest version to get started!

Our newest update is ready for you! 

As your #1 Dictionary app, we are on a constant quest for improvement. With features like new word releases, quizzes and editorial content, you can be too. 

Download the newest version to get started!
Encountering issues with viewing your WOTD from the widget? We’ve got a fix for that! Update now to receive the newest release.
Encountering issues with viewing your WOTD from the widget? We’ve got a fix for that! Update now to receive the newest release.

What do the best writers have in common? An updated Dictionary app!

Whether you’re writing for college or a caption for your latest selfie, our writing tips, grammar guidance, and editorial content can help. 

Update your app to upgrade your writing today!
Experiencing issues with notifications? This build is for you! Update now for a fix to duplicate notifications...Stay tuned for the next update for more fixes!
Update now for a fix to the Word of The Day notification! Happy Learning

Here’s a grammar pro-tip: update your app!

Download our latest version for grammar tips, tricks, and tools for top-notch writing.

You asked we delivered!

Check out our newly added feature: Personalized Word Lists! Create an account (or log in if you already have one), and start saving words today! You’ll have access to your personalized Word Lists on your computer or phone.

Want even more? Turn your Word Lists into Flashcards and Quizzes — Perfect for anyone who wants to grow their mental glossary.
